title: The 411 on Medicinal Foods to Change Your Life, with Dr. Uma Naidoo
description:
Dr. Uma Naidoo, Harvard-trained nutritional psychiatrist, professional chef, and nutrition specialist joins Jillian for a question-and-answer session on the best and worst foods for libido, depression, anxiety, sleep, menopause, energy…Plus, get Dr. Naidoo’s professional take on everything from intermittent fasting, electrolyte imbalances, turmeric, keto, alcohol, caffeine and more!

Guest Links:

Visit her at https://umanaidoomd.com

This is Your Brain on Food: https://book.umanaidoomd.com

IG: @DrUmaNaidoo


For 25% off The Fitness App by Jillian Michaels, go to www.thefitnessapp.com/podcastdeal

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy

Jillian Michaels Community: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1880466198675549

Email your questions to JillianPodcast@gmail.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
